reviewText: This is an amazing video.  Super helpful in teaching the youth.
Teenage daughter really enjoyed it. Good information in a trying world, good for every teen to watch with their parent.

To see such palpable good sense being spoken about moral purity and chastity is such a breath of oxygenated air.  And here it is spoken by an apostle of the Lord Jesus Christ, no less.  Stunning clarity and spiritual intelligence being offered to all of us, not for youth only.

For those who seek to inculcate young people with the idea that sexual intimacy is not to be engaged in outside the bonds of marriage, this is a must watch.  Too often, we tell young people that they should refrain from sexual intimacy outside marriage; that such conduct is morally reprehensible to God; yet, we fail to explain why that is the case.

This presentation by Elder Holland does an excellent job of explaining the whys.  It is very tastefully done, yet direct and powerful.  It is highly recommended to anyone dealing with young people and sexuality; indeed, it should be viewed by all adults as well in a world run amuck by the glorification of illicit sex and the presentation of women as objects.
